answers.answer: I failed the first one too on Monday. My level was at 137. I took the 3 hour test yesterday and was borderline again, but my Dr. said I passed. It's a long process, but many people I know had to take the 3 hour test as well and passed. I wish you luck.

Thanks. I barely passed the 1 hr one last pregnancy....and barely flunked this one. They didn't give me numbers. I have to be at the hospital lab by 7 am on Monday morning.  That's 30 min away...so much for sleep ;)

Atleast you will sleep through the majority of the fasting part. I went in the morning too. It's just a lot of waiting time. I hope you get good results. But even with positive GD, sometimes just a change in diet is all you need.
Yeah....i just started antibiotics for a sinus infection to boot so hoping that I get to sleep the night before..lol

question: Failed the 1st test n so now I get to do the 3 hour one. Yuk. I barely flunked the last one. Ugg...anyone else in the same boat?
title: Failed gestational diabetes test
